name: @midcurve/evm
description: Local EVM development node for strategy testing

scripts.up: npm run generate:genesis && docker-compose build && docker-compose up -d
scripts.up:prod: npm run generate:genesis && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d
scripts.reset:prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml down -v && npm run up:prod
